<div class="description-container">
  <div class="description-left">
  Materials for the <a href="https://safetygraphics.github.io/">safetyGraphics</a> R Pharma 2021 Workshop on 2021-10-29 from 9 AM - 12 noon ET.
  
  The [Interactive Safety Graphics (ISG)](https://safetygraphics.github.io/) subteam of the ASA Biopharm-DIA Safety Working Group is an interdisciplinary effort that, amongst other things, seeks to provide a clinical safety workflow for monitoring during clinical development in an open source model. 
  
Sign up [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd4wkSfaajuj3iaVHirqj8L05S3yH7GVGwopufWRMmjif4IDg/viewform?usp=sf_link) if you'd like to learn more or get involved!

## Setup

We'll be using [RStudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/) for this workshop. Click [this link](https://rstudio.cloud/spaces/179933/project/3011333) to an RStudio Project that includes all examples, exercises and [Slides (pptx)](https://github.com/SafetyGraphics/RPharma2021-Workshop/blob/main/slides/SafetyGraphicsWorkshop.pptx?raw=true).
